Dish.Name: Mystery Protein Skewer
Dish.Description: Grilled over an open flame with minimal seasoning, this skewer delivers a savory, smoky flavor that fills the belly, if not the conscience.

Dish.Name: Charred Long Pork Filet
Dish.Description: Seared to perfection and lightly seasoned, this filet offers tender bites and a rich, meaty finish that some colonists find disturbingly delightful.

Dish.Name: Crimson Glazed Long Pork
Dish.Description: Slow-braised in berry reduction and finished with a wine glaze, this gourmet delicacy melts on the tongue, leaving a hauntingly sweet aftertaste.

Dish.Name: Potato and Mushroom Casserole
Dish.Description: Sliced potatoes layered with mushrooms and baked until golden. The earthy flavors of both ingredients complement each other wonderfully.
